entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:11 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 08:38 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
